backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing cholera outbreak risk prediction using weighted environmental factors (rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria) with 7-day moving averages and adjustment factors, returning risk percentage and category (Low/Medium/High).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented requirements including role-based dashboard views, LastGovernmentReport component, Public Transparency Dashboard title, and component visibility rules for Common Citizen users.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components describing role-based access control, medical analytics theme with professional blue accents, white card styling, and read-only vs interactive dashboard sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for medical analytics theme including professional blue, yellow/amber, green, and red color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for 'Community Health Sentinel' application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application using TanStack Router with RoleSelector component that gates dashboard access, requiring role selection (community/healthcare/admin) before rendering DashboardPage.
frontend/src/components/AlertEngine.tsx: Alert recommendation component displaying color-coded risk alerts (Green <30%, Yellow 30-70%, Red >70%) with specific action items and emergency response protocols based on risk percentage.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistory.tsx: Alert history table component with ward and risk level filters, displaying historical alert records from localStorage with timestamps, environmental data, risk levels, and recommended actions.
frontend/src/components/CaseVolumeProjec: Displays a 7-day case volume projection table based on risk category (low/moderate/high), generating simulated daily case estimates with an upward trend.
frontend/src/components/DataFreshnessFoo: Shows the current date, time, and data source information footer indicating when data was last updated.
frontend/src/components/DiseaseClassific: Visualizes disease risk distribution using horizontal bar and pie charts, showing probability percentages for Cholera, Typhoid, Dysentery, and Hepatitis A with the highest risk highlighted.
frontend/src/components/DistrictRiskOver: Displays four key metrics in card format: district risk index, high-risk wards count, monsoon impact level, and system operational status.
frontend/src/components/ExplainableAI.ts: Shows AI factor contribution analysis with horizontal bar charts displaying the impact of rainfall, humidity, turbidity, and bacteria index on outbreak risk.
frontend/src/components/ExportButton.tsx: Generates and exports ward-level risk analysis data to CSV format, including outbreak probability, risk level, vulnerability metrics, and infrastructure coverage for all wards.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Renders a 14-day predictive risk forecast line chart with confidence score and model AUC metrics, showing risk percentage trends over time.
frontend/src/components/GovernmentDataPa: Provides a form for government officials to input environmental, infrastructure, and health data per ward, with validation, 7-day averages calculation, and integration with backend actor for risk assessment and email alerts.
frontend/src/components/InterventionPrio: Displays a ranked table and bar chart of ward intervention priorities based on outbreak probability, vulnerability factors (sanitation, water treatment, population density), and calculated priority scores.
frontend/src/components/LastGovernmentRe: Shows the most recent government inspection report with timestamp and key metrics (water quality, bacteria level, turbidity, rainfall, humidity, sanitation/water treatment coverage) loaded from localStorage or default data.
frontend/src/components/NearestSupportCe: Displays contact information and location details for the nearest health support center including name, address, phone number, and operating hours.
frontend/src/components/PatientCaseTrend: Renders a line chart showing 30-day patient case trends with generated realistic variance and occasional spikes to visualize disease outbreak patterns.
frontend/src/components/PreventiveRecomm: Lists preventive health recommendations with icons including water boiling, hand washing, food safety, and medical attention guidance.
frontend/src/components/ResourceEstimati: Calculates and displays required resource quantities (medical staff, hospital beds, water purification units, chlorination teams) based on risk level and percentage using a bar chart and detailed list.
frontend/src/components/ResourcePlanning: Provides resource planning recommendations for staff allocation, supply management, and bed capacity based on the current risk category (low, moderate, or high).
frontend/src/components/RiskComponentBre: Visualizes weighted risk contributions from rainfall (30%), turbidity (25%), contamination (25%), and humidity (20%) using a color-coded bar chart with normalized values.
frontend/src/components/RiskGauge.tsx: Displays a visual risk gauge showing the current cholera outbreak risk percentage with color-coded labels (low/medium/high) and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/RiskPredictionPa: Form component for inputting environmental and health data (rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria, etc.) to predict cholera outbreak risk, with role-based fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelector.tsx: Landing page component that allows users to select their role (community citizen, healthcare worker, or government authority) to access appropriate dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/SafetyAdvisory.t: Displays risk-appropriate safety advisories and health recommendations based on the current risk category (low, moderate, or high).
frontend/src/components/SystemArchitectu: Collapsible card component that visualizes the system's layered architecture from user dashboard to cloud infrastructure with deployment notes.
frontend/src/components/WardComparison.t: Bar chart component comparing cholera outbreak probability across 9 wards using color-coded risk levels and adjustment factors.
frontend/src/components/WardHeatmap.tsx: Grid-based heatmap displaying risk percentages for 9 wards in Coimbatore District with color-coded tiles based on outbreak probability.
frontend/src/components/WardSelector.tsx: Dropdown selector component for choosing one of 9 wards, marked as a required field for risk prediction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state and automatic query invalidation when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a clean white medical analytics theme with professional blue primary colors, chart colors, and custom utilities for medical UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page component displaying health risk analytics with tabs for overview, predictions, and government data, including ward selection, risk gauges, and multiple visualization panels.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component showcasing the AI-powered early warning system for water-borne diseases with hero section and feature grid highlighting real-time monitoring capabilities.
Service for sending email alerts via EmailJS with risk level, environmental parameters, and ward information, falling back to console simulation when EmailJS is unavailable.
frontend/src/utils/wardDataGenerator.ts: Utility functions generating deterministic ward data (sanitation coverage, water treatment, population density) using seeded pseudo-random values based on ward IDs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with medical/government color palettes, custom border radius variables, and container settings for the health analytics UI.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a Community Health Sentinel system with 19 versions, featuring role-based access (Common Citizen, Hospital/PHC, Government Authority) for water-borne disease monitoring in Coimbatore District. Includes comprehensive feature tracking, architectural notes for UI styling (white/blue medical theme), and detailed dashboard capabilities including risk assessment, forecasting, and EmailJS integration.
